title: Multi Challenger ADC Player LF Challenger Support.
body:
So I have come back from a break, playing on a new account which you can check out http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Favourite

I have had several challenger accounts, I'm not looking for some plat player that thinks he's challenger. I want a support to Dynamic Queue with that doesn't make me face plant every 30 seconds. 

In return for your services, you will receive - a very high win rate, easy games and my undeniable love. (unless you're trash)

I'm not the type of person to suck your dick all day even when you're miss playing, so if you can't accept constructive criticism, kindly jog on.

Add me in game on Favourite or pm me here, up to you.

LATA

replies.body:
Hey man i would love to play a game or 2 with you to see if we play well together, Been looking for someone to play with that can also help me improve.
IGN: Kat to Plat
Well I m just a plat sup, guess I m not good enough zz{{item:3070}}
